item.title: Syfy House of Imagination
item.description: In commemoration of SCI FI's brand evolution to Syfy, the "House of Imagination" brand film invites viewers into a celebratory house party populated with rooms inspired by the Channel's original programs and characters. Production design was handled by adNAU partner Tino Schaedler with fellow adNAU partner Oliver Zeller joining on digital set design for the 2010 sequel.
item.content:encoded: In commemoration of SCI FI's brand evolution to Syfy, the "House of Imagination" brand film invites viewers into a celebratory house party populated with rooms inspired by the Channel's original programs and characters. Production design was handled by adNAU partner Tino Schaedler with fellow adNAU partner Oliver Zeller joining on digital set design for the 2010 sequel.

item.title: KangaROOS
item.description: Be Retro retrata la personalidad ochentera de la marca mezclando una explosión de colores, formas dinámicas y simbolismos gráficos que te transportan hacia los mismísimos 80s mostrando la esencia colorida llena de explosión de colores y diseños que alucinaran tu pupila. , la campaña trata de darle un valor agregado a la marca en cuanto a su personalidad relajada, libre y original. Para la campaña se usaron iconos de la época de los ochenta y se mezcló con colores de la época, todo esto se unifico en ilustración para crear un concepto sólido, impactante y sólido, eso es Be Retro.
item.content:encoded: Be Retro retrata la personalidad ochentera de la marca mezclando una explosión de colores, formas dinámicas y simbolismos gráficos que te transportan hacia los mismísimos 80s mostrando la esencia colorida llena de explosión de colores y diseños que alucinaran tu pupila. , la campaña trata de darle un valor agregado a la marca en cuanto a su personalidad relajada, libre y original. Para la campaña se usaron iconos de la época de los ochenta y se mezcló con colores de la época, todo esto se unifico en ilustración para crear un concepto sólido, impactante y sólido, eso es Be Retro.

item.title: TRIPTYCHON - ich suche, ich wünsche, ich will das Neue
item.description: Iannis Xenakis der griechische Architekt und Komponist entwickelte zu seiner Zeit eine neuartige und zukunftsorientierte Musik. Konsequent übetrug er mathematische und physikalische Modelle in seine Kompositionen und arbeitete statt mit Melodien und Harmonien mit Massen, Wolken, Verzweigungen und Flächen. Inspiriert durch seine Musikästhetik und meiner Interpretation schuf ich eine bildgeladene Hommage an einen den eindrucksvollsten Künstler unserer Epoche. Ich illustrierte einen Bildband von 15 Metern Länge, das auf abstrakte Weise über das Leben des Künstlers erzählt, untermalt von einigen seiner besten Musikstücke. Begleitend zu meinem Bildband enstanden drei Hefte, die als Nachschlagwerk zu den Illustrationen dienen. Hier spricht Iannis Xenakis selbst über seine musikalischen und persönlichen Entwicklungen. Diese Texte waren meine Vorlage für meine illustrativen Darstellungen und dienen so zum Verständnis der abstrakten Bilderwelt. Ein integriertes Koordinatensystem an dem Illustrationsband leitet zu den begleitendem Abschnitten im Text; umgekehrt kann man sich an den Koordinaten im Text orientieren.
item.content:encoded: Iannis Xenakis der griechische Architekt und Komponist entwickelte zu seiner Zeit eine neuartige und zukunftsorientierte Musik. Konsequent übetrug er mathematische und physikalische Modelle in seine Kompositionen und arbeitete statt mit Melodien und Harmonien mit Massen, Wolken, Verzweigungen und Flächen. Inspiriert durch seine Musikästhetik und meiner Interpretation schuf ich eine bildgeladene Hommage an einen den eindrucksvollsten Künstler unserer Epoche. Ich illustrierte einen Bildband von 15 Metern Länge, das auf abstrakte Weise über das Leben des Künstlers erzählt, untermalt von einigen seiner besten Musikstücke. Begleitend zu meinem Bildband enstanden drei Hefte, die als Nachschlagwerk zu den Illustrationen dienen. Hier spricht Iannis Xenakis selbst über seine musikalischen und persönlichen Entwicklungen. Diese Texte waren meine Vorlage für meine illustrativen Darstellungen und dienen so zum Verständnis der abstrakten Bilderwelt. Ein integriertes Koordinatensystem an dem Illustrationsband leitet zu den begleitendem Abschnitten im Text; umgekehrt kann man sich an den Koordinaten im Text orientieren.

item.title: Renew Solar Battery Charger
item.description: Teamwork with Tracy Subisak & Herlinda 2009, 2 months Renew is a solar battery charger that eradicates the confusion between fully charged and depleted batteries by a smart and simple reconfiguration of the way batteries are loaded and stored within chargers. This usage clarity and intuitiveness, together with its approachable aesthetics and high visibility afforded by its freedom from wall socket connections, seeks to encourage users to switch from disposables to rechargeables. Renew was honored with the 2009 Lite-On Gold Award and the 2010 iF Product Design Award.
item.content:encoded: Teamwork with Tracy Subisak & Herlinda 2009, 2 months Renew is a solar battery charger that eradicates the confusion between fully charged and depleted batteries by a smart and simple reconfiguration of the way batteries are loaded and stored within chargers. This usage clarity and intuitiveness, together with its approachable aesthetics and high visibility afforded by its freedom from wall socket connections, seeks to encourage users to switch from disposables to rechargeables. Renew was honored with the 2009 Lite-On Gold Award and the 2010 iF Product Design Award.

item.title: Turns of Speech and Figures of Phrase
item.description: 'Turns of Speech & Figures of Phrase' is inspired by lyrics misheard and mixed up. All pieces are hand embroidered and feature lyrics borrowed from bands such as Blondie, Menomena, Pavement and the Unicorns.
item.content:encoded: 'Turns of Speech & Figures of Phrase' is inspired by lyrics misheard and mixed up. All pieces are hand embroidered and feature lyrics borrowed from bands such as Blondie, Menomena, Pavement and the Unicorns.

item.title: Monique Péan CFDA Book
item.description: Roanne and her team worked to shape Monique's brand story into a one-of-a-kind oversized brand book. We designed an over-sized hand bound book with 25,000 year old Mammoth bone pieces from Antarctica in-laid into the sustainable canvas cover.
item.content:encoded: Roanne and her team worked to shape Monique's brand story into a one-of-a-kind oversized brand book. We designed an over-sized hand bound book with 25,000 year old Mammoth bone pieces from Antarctica in-laid into the sustainable canvas cover.

item.title: WWW.TOSAY.IT - Public Interventions
item.description: TOSAY.IT is a continuation and a large update of our past projects with public text posters. After it gained a big exposure and interest through the internet and publications. we started to receive emails from people who were interested in doing the same, there were plenty of street artists & art students among interested. The messages found their new lives on the websites, blogs, books and even tattooed on the bodies. It stimulated us to bring the project to the next level by creating a website, where people could expose the posters they hung up in their locations. So that the website as a medium stimulates people to put up their messages, that together could be considered as one reflective piece. We came up with the domain name www.toSay.it. The main idea of the project is to explore text, streets & internet as an artistic medium, to broadcast actual ideas that are usually ignored by mass media, or to comment on the issues that seem important to put up by the author of the text. We hope the website will became an interesting public platform to explore, where words became more accessible. Participants of the project are people with different ideas, backgrounds, hometowns, so the texts are also different. Every time we travel somewhere we take posters with us, so the project becomes widespread. In november 2010 TOSAY.IT was exposed in Moscow's activistic art gallery at Vinzavod. In upcoming August it is going to be represented in public space in the center of Amsterdam. item.title: The Flow
item.description: The Flow looks at the supervening layers of reality that we can observe, from quarks to nucleons to atoms and beyond. The deeper we go into the foundations of reality the more it loses its form, eventually becoming a pure mathematical conception. The Flow visually imagines physical processes that we are unable to directly observe with any imaginable medium, while referring to modern physical theories and scientific visualisation processes. It alludes to ideas of digital physics, complexity and information theories as well as the concepts of universal Darwinism, emergence and supervenience.
item.content:encoded: The Flow looks at the supervening layers of reality that we can observe, from quarks to nucleons to atoms and beyond. The deeper we go into the foundations of reality the more it loses its form, eventually becoming a pure mathematical conception. The Flow visually imagines physical processes that we are unable to directly observe with any imaginable medium, while referring to modern physical theories and scientific visualisation processes. It alludes to ideas of digital physics, complexity and information theories as well as the concepts of universal Darwinism, emergence and supervenience.

item.title: WUWI WORLD
item.description: WUWI is a totally independent and unique society. It transcends the boundaries between the online environment and the real world. The possibilities are endless for social interaction, whether wearing or displaying your WUWI-ID as you cruise through everyday life in the real world and leaving your mark wherever you go, or indeed while you surf through your online daily dalliances. You just never know when or where somebody might ID you while you are making your WUWI statement - online or offline. WITH//UNITY//WE//INSPIRE
item.content:encoded: WUWI is a totally independent and unique society. It transcends the boundaries between the online environment and the real world. The possibilities are endless for social interaction, whether wearing or displaying your WUWI-ID as you cruise through everyday life in the real world and leaving your mark wherever you go, or indeed while you surf through your online daily dalliances. You just never know when or where somebody might ID you while you are making your WUWI statement - online or offline. WITH//UNITY//WE//INSPIRE
